High-level API(s) to SNMP protocol operations

The pysnmp.proto.api sub-package is a collection of various high-level API(s) to SNMP protocol objects. These API(s) aim at hiding unimportant protocol details and unify common operations over different protocol versions.

This package contains the following sub-packages:

  • API implementations
    • Alpha API
  • Error handling
    • Package-level exceptions
